d2_dictionary.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing¬OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences eTMF Solution
d2_dictionary.dql: select distinct v.object_name as name, v.locale_value as label_en from d2_dictionary_value v, d2_dictionary d where d.object_name = v.dictionary_name and d.object_name = 'Submission Country' and any v.locale_value is not nullstring and v.object_name in (select distinct product_trade_country from cd_product_info where product_code='$value(product_code)' and product_trade_country != ' ' and product_trade_name = '$value(product_trade_name)' ) and v.i_position = d.i_position order by locale_value enable (ROW_BASED)
